item.description:
Great way to get together and meet a lot of fun people.
Hawaiin Theme Night, best outfit gets $25 prize will be given at 10 pm

Super relaxed atmosphere / Indoor & outdoor bars / Outdoor Dancing / Lots of room to mingle / DJ MM playing favorites & request / Contest / and lots of new faces so come on down to say Aloha!

Don't be shy, I think this will be the biggest event of the summer
Free Hot Dogs Too Or you can order some BBQ
Casual Dress is allowed but the best Hawaiin Costume will win $25

Doors open at 7 pm for the early birds, $5 cover till 8pm / $10 after

THE PATIO, 105 Canal St. Rear. Malden, MA
Rear of Anthony's
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright crazy shirt or just ask.
item.name: Dancing under the stars, with the grass between your toes! Hawaiian night.
